name: Petzl Lim'Ice Ice Screw Sharpener
description: Simple and fast to operate, so you can get the teeth of your screws sharp again after bottoming out on hard granite.  The 2 sharpening guides offer precision sharpening on both sides of the teeth.Made of polypropylene with hemp fibres. File is steel.2 sharpening guides provide precise sharpening on both sides of the teeth.Standard sharpening guides allow sharpening of most screws.High-quality file is reversible for extended life.
